name: Find The Bomb
description:
Hidden within a bustling crowd lies a bomb that is almost ready to blow. It's up to you to search the crowd  and disarm it before it's too late. Hurry, time's ticking and lives are at stake.

Controls:

  • Left click <object>  - Search object
  • Left click  <bomb> - Disarm bomb
  • P - pause game
  • F- fullscreen

Features:

  1. The levels are randomly generated making each play through different from the last.
  2. Levels get harder as you progress.
  3. 3 different difficulties affecting the people in the crowd and the rate at which the levels get harder.
  4. Keeps track of your best score.

Credits:

  • Game Design/Art/Coding - Richard Cantu
  • PlayTesters - MomonLive, Invader369

note: If you are getting an error when running the game, it is possible that it is ad-blocker, as the game tries to save your high-score.
